We are [experienced AI Engineers](team.qmd) who have built AI products at leading tech companies.

# Services

## Strategy

We will advise you on:

-   LLM performance issues: (cost, quality, speed)
-   Evals, RAG, fine-tuning, and prompt engineering

We will provide your team with ongoing guidance through regular meetings and contiouous async access.

## Implementation

We also offer hands-on services:

-  **Implementation:** We will write production-ready code to accelerate your AI product development.
-  **Model Optimization:** We will implement domain-specific eval systems, fine-tune, prompt engineer and debug models to improve performance.
-  **Tools and Infrastructure:** We will build tools that enable you to execute consistently and quickly.

# Pricing

Our minimum level of engagement typically start at $21,500.  We customize our pricing based on expected outcomes.

**[Fill out this form](https://form.typeform.com/to/M8f89mlM) to book a meeting with us to get started.**  You can also contact us at `consulting@parlance-labs.com` with any questions.
